name: MonsterZ
description:
How To Play?
You're the devil in a fantasy world, with your supreme reign, but there's a hero who tries taking your reign off and kill you. Your mission is to make sure the hero succeeds in killing you.
Spawn enemies smartly, do everything to make sure that the hero will be strong enough, to defeat your reign once he faces you.

Keys
Camera Movement - Mouse
Spawn Enemies - Click on enemy pictures (If you have enough money)
